item.title: Bradley Cooper’s ‘Is This Thing On?’ Debuts First Look, Sets New York Film Festival World Premiere
item.description: Bradley Cooper’s dramatic comedy “Is This Thing On?” will host its world premiere at the New York Film Festival. It will be the festival’s closing night film on Oct. 10 at Linc
